title: The boke of comfort called in laten Boetius de Consolatione philosophie. Translated in to englesse tonge
author: Boethius, d. 524.
publicationPlace: [Enprented in the exempt monastery of Tauestok in Denshyre :
publisher: By me Dan Thomas Rychard monke of the sayd monaster, to the iu[n]stant desyre if ryght worshypful esquyer Mayster Robert Langdon,
